reqs:
This section is for 1st year students. If you are a transfer student, please register for section XMT.
This section is reserved ONLY for first-year LFS students with a CHEM 111 scheduling conflict. Students must email LFS Student Services after their registration date/time has opened to enrol: students@landfood.ubc.ca. If students will be taking CHEM 121, they should be enrolling in section 001.
This section is reserved for TRANSFER students only. Students not approved for this section will be removed by LFS Student Services.
courseName: Introduction to Land, Food and Community
description: Orientation to the programs, learning environment and core values of the Faculty of Land and Food Systems; career programs; survey of professional opportunities and requirements.
